title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
Updates from v1.18.0:

  • Enforce player settings: New setting to enforce configurations on player side by default.
  • Themes on Actor Sheets: Your chosen color theme now applies to actor sheets (PC and NPC). Horizontal tabs on sheets can be disabled in style settings.


Updates from v1.17.1:

  • Reworked Scene Navigation: Toggle the folder icon to see your folder structure. Untoggle to quickly hide the folders. There's also new icons on scene preview for checking global illumination and token vision.

Check more on Github repo or Discord
Note: Only update to v2.x of my module after you upgrade Foundry to v13.
